pages.text: Having access to only manual labor with which to power my new machines has grown very annoying - almost as if whatever forces that shaped this world wanted to stifle my innovation. I have been tinkering with those flowers again, and may have derived a solution. And of course I'll need some kind of motor...

pages.title: Mana-driven Motors
pages.text: Mana is a form of energy, and so it would only make sense for it to be able to create an electrical charge that can drive a motor. This should suffice for awhile.
